description: This file defines a Python class 'Streamlit' that extends 'DockerApp' to configure and manage a Streamlit application within a Docker container. It includes configuration parameters for image details, ports, workspace, and environment variables, as well as a method to generate container environment variables based on the class attributes.

classes.name: Streamlit
classes.description: A class representing a Streamlit application container configuration, extending DockerApp with specific settings and environment variable generation.

methods.name: get_container_env
methods.description: Generates environment variables for the container based on the class configuration and context.
